name: Nodemongodbbackbone
tagline: Practice simple application using nodejs,mongodb and backbone
body:
This is just a practice application. Undone because I'm so busy with my Android Project. Actually, I'm a total newbie in Node.js. I'll try to focus this new technology after all my projects in other languages are done - i'm very interested in mastering this language for it's very awesome and for sure it's the future of the web development. ;)

Give thanks to someone that urge me to learn(basics) of this language, though I'm not competent right now, but for sure tomorrow, I will be great in this. 


_greatness comes from practicing_ prerequisite [theory]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
